name: BlackHistoryFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Black History Facts”
”Alexa, start Black History Facts”
”Alexa, ask Black History Facts for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: black history facts
des: Ask Alexa for an interesting list of black history facts about your topic of choice. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
